text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Good thanks! You?
Very well. Do you have any particular hobbies that you enjoy?
Mostly into hiking these days - how about you? Do you have any info on this children's charity we're supposed to talk about?
I like to play golf, as well as go on walks with my dog. Yes, the charity sounds like it does a lot of great work.
Walks with the dog sound awesome.  I wasn't given any information about the charity but am happy to help.

Great! I have three children myself, and the welfare of children around the world is a very important cause to me. Save the Children is an international organization that is not involved with any government, and they're able to promote children's rights and support kids in developing countries.
Sounds like great work.  I donate to a lot of different causes but am happy to pitch in. Are we attempting to agree on a donation amount?
That might be a good idea. Just to give some more info, they are a charity you can trust to actually do the work they promise to do. Any donation we give will make an impact around the world.
Very cool, I have heard of them but never looked into them too closely. Do you already donate to them? Monthly or one-time?
You can do either. I prefer monthly, just so it fits in my budget easier.
Sounds good. Suggestions on a donation amount?
How about some of the payment from this HIT? Any amount from $0 to all of your payment would help.
Sure, I'm happy to donate half the payment for the HIT

$1 will help a lot, but $2 would really help them reach kids around the world. I would rather get all of the payment too, but helping kids is better than spending that $1 on a candy bar or other snack instead.
I'll start with $1 and maybe give more later :)

That's okay. Just so you're aware, a large part of their work is in war zones such as Syria. In the first two months of 2018, around 1,000 children were killed or injured due to violence there. Save the Children works to provide relief in countries like that.
Yeah I've seen a lot of the news on Syria, it's horrible.  I work with Doctors Without Borders too, glad there are multiple players in the region to help!
So $1 is your donation? I'm sure that Save the Children will put it to good use!
Yes, $1 - thank you
